name: 張裕煦
objective: 本課程討論，利用儀器分析工作之理論，儀器之原理，構造操作等。包括光譜學基礎，UV-Vis，ICP-AES，FT-IR，XPS/Auger electron spectroscopy，SEM/AFM，TGA/DTA/DSC等儀器之探討。
schedule:
1.     Chap. 1  Introduction
2-3   Chap. 6  An introduction to spectrometric methods
3-4   Chap. 8  An introduction to optical atomic spectrometry
5     exam 1
6-7   Chap. 9  Atomic absorption and atomic fluorescence spectrometry 
8-9   Chap. 10 Atomic emission spectrometry
10-11  Chap. 14 Applications of UV/Vis absorption spectrometry
12    exam 2
13-14 Chap. 16 An introduction to infrared spectrometry
15     Chap. 17 Applications of infrared spectrometry
16     Chap. 21 Surface characterization by spectroscopy & microscopy
17     Chap. 31 Thermal methods
18     Final exam
scorePolicy:
The final grade will be determined by:
33.3 % midterm 1 + 33.3 % midterm 2 +
33.3 % final exam + attendance
materials:
Principles of Instrumental Analysis –
THOMSON Brooks/Cole; 7th edition; Skoog, Holler, Crouch
